content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

## Count & Layers
The target structure consists of 8 building blocks arranged in 3 layers:
- Bottom layer: 3 red blocks (two with arch cutouts and one with semi-circular cutouts)
- Middle layer: 2 blocks (1 red block with circular opening and 1 yellow rectangular block)
- Top layer: 3 blocks (1 yellow rectangular block, 1 blue cube, and 1 red block with semi-circular cutout)

## Spatial Relationships
- The bottom layer has a red block with two arch cutouts (right side) connected to a red block with semi-circular cutouts (left side)
- On the left structure: a red semi-circular cutout block with a blue cube sitting on top
- On the right structure: a red block with circular opening, with yellow rectangular blocks both below and above it

# Required Blocks from Dictionary

Based on my analysis, I need the following blocks:
- Block 1: Red arch block (bottom right)
- Block 3: Red semi-circular cutout block (bottom left)
- Block 4: Red semi-circular cutout block (top left)
- Block 5: Red circular opening block (right section)
- Block 9: Blue cube (sits on top of left structure)
- Block 15: Yellow rectangular block (middle layer, right structure)
- Block 16: Yellow rectangular block (top layer, right structure)

# Assembly Order

```
{
    Step1: Move block with index 1
    Step2: Move block with index 3
    Step3: Move block with index 5
    Step4: Move block with index 15
    Step5: Move block with index 16
    Step6: Move block with index 4
    Step7: Move block with index 9
}
```

This assembly sequence starts with the bottom layer, builds up the right structure with the circular opening and yellow blocks, and finishes with the left structure topped with the blue cube.
